short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A browser extension that helps you and the researchers analyze all the malicious content displayed on different websites.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A browser extension that helps you and the researchers analyze all the malicious content displayed on different websites. This tool enables you to contribute data about the malicious content being displayed. This data helps the researchers segregate the malicious content from the internet to ensure an immaculate browsing environment. 
Malicious Content Observer is offered by the "Ads and Malicious Content Observatory for the Social Media".
